## PublishRequest type

Represents the request during the publishing process.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PublishRequest = {
    $type?: string;
    Ids?: Array<string>;
    Priority?: PublishPriority;
    PublishInstruction: PublishInstruction;
    TargetIdsOrPurposes?: Array<string>;
};
```
